summary: The package provides a version‑parsing utility and a comprehensive test suite that builds a wide variety of Qiskit objects (circuits, gates, parameters, control‑flow structures, and schedules) to verify that the QPY binary serialization format remains backward compatible across different Qiskit releases.
business_intent: Ensure that QPY serialization continues to work reliably after Qiskit updates, preventing regression and preserving user workflows that depend on loading previously saved quantum programs.
